Learning Resource Updates

New docs and major updates.

05-Jul-2024

New Docs

  • Title: Android SDK v9.0 Migration Guide
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about the new improvements and features in the major version release of Android SDK v9.0.
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/basics/android-v9-migration-guide.html
  • Title: Android: Background Playback
  • Description: In this topic, you will learn about enabling Background Playback.
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/playback/android-background-playback.html

Major updates

  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Native SDK for iOS
  • Description: Brightcove Native Player for iOS release 6.13.2
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/ios/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-ios.html
  • Title: Social Sharing Plugin
  • Description: Twitter references removed and replaced for X
  • Link: https://player.support.brightcove.com/plugins/social-sharing-plugin.html
  • Title: Brightcove Native SDK for Android Release Notes
  • Description: New Android SDK v9.0.0 Release
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/resources/brightcove-native-sdk-android-release-notes.html
  • Title: Overview: Brightcove Native SDK for Android
  • Description: New Android SDK v9.0.0 Release
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/basics/overview-brightcove-player-sdk-android.html
  • Title: Brightcove Native SDK for Android: Previous SDK information
  • Description: Previous relase SDK v8.4.4 added
  • Link: https://sdks.support.brightcove.com/android/resources/brightcove-player-sdk-android-previous-sdk-information.html
